articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Yang Gon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Yang Gon
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Wednesday sent a wreath to the bier of Kim Yang Gon, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Kim Yang Gon Dies
articles.content:
Kim Yang Gon Dies
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yang Gon, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, died in a traffic accident at 6:15 on December 29, Juche 104 (2015) at the age of 73. 
					 Kim Yang Gon is a revolutionary soldier faithful to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the closest comrade-in-arms and steadfast revolutionary comrade of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 He is a fine son of the WPK and the Korean people as he devoted himself to the struggle for the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche, true to the leadership of the party and the leader. 
					
					 Born in a very poor family of day-laborer during the period of the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists, he could lead a new life only under the care of Kim Il Sung after the liberation of the country. He grew up to be a genuine revolutionary and able political activist thanks to the particular trust and loving care of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 After graduating from Kim Il Sung University, he worked as an instructor of the Central Committee of the youth league and the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and then he held various posts such as an instructor, vice section chief, section chief, vice director and director of the International Affairs Department of the WPK Central Committee, making positive contributions to fully preparing the young people as reliable successors to the revolutionary cause of Juche, raising the international prestige of the dignified WPK and boosting solidarity with the progressive political parties of the world. 
					
					 Holding the important posts of the director of the United Front Department of the Central Committee of the WPK and its secretary, he devotedly worked to implement the WPK's policy for the independent reunification of the country. 
					
					 He devoted all his wisdom and energies to the work for developing the WPK into the great Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's party and thoroughly carrying out the last instructions of the great leaders for national reunification, remaining true to the unitary leadership of the Party Central Committee in the crucial historic period for carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 An obituary of Kim Yang Gon was issued in the joint name of the WPK Central Committee and the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on Tuesday. 
					
					 The obituary said though he passed away, the devoted efforts and shining exploits he performed for the party and the revolution, the cause of building a thriving nation and the cause of national reunification will last forever. 
					
					 The WPK Central Committee and the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK announced on the same day that the late Kim Yang Gon would be accorded a state funeral and formed a state funeral committee with Kim Jong Un as its chairman and with 69 persons including Kim Yong Nam as members.
					
					 The funeral committee said the bier of the late Kim Yang Gon is laid in the Sojang Club of Pothonggang District, Pyongyang City and it would receive mourners from 14:00 to 19:00 on Wednesday and that the coffin would be carried out of the club at 8:00 on Thursday.

articles.title: Death of Kim Yang Gon Mourned
articles.content:
Death of Kim Yang Gon Mourned
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Officials of the party, armed forces bodies, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, former unconverted long-term prisoners, and people from all walks of life Wednesday visited the bier of Kim Yang Gon, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, expressing deep condolences over his death.
					 A wreath sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un was seen standing before the bier.  
					
					 Placed there were wreaths in the names of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, the Cabinet of the DPRK, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 They observed a moment's silence in memory of the late Kim Yang Gon.
					
					 They expressed deep condolences to the bereaved families of the deceased.

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats, Overseas Koreans Mourn Death of Kim Yang Gon
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats, Overseas Koreans Mourn Death of Kim Yang Gon
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The diplomatic corps and the military attaches corps here Wednesday visited the bier of Kim Yang Gon, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, in the Sojang Club, expressing deep condolences over his death. 
					 A wreath sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un was seen standing before the bier.
					
					 The guests laid wreaths before the bier in the names of the diplomatic corps and the military attaches corps and observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Yang Gon.
					
					 Overseas Koreans staying in the motherland visited the bier of the deceased, expressing condolences.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Yong Ok
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Ri Yong Ok
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Tuesday sent a wreath to the bier of anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter Ri Yong Ok, expressing deep condolences over her death.

articles.title: Greetings to Congolese Party of Labor
articles.content:
Greetings to Congolese Party of Labor
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea sent a congratulatory message to the Central Committee of the Congolese Party of Labor on Wednesday on the occasion of the 46th founding anniversary of the party.
					 The message expressed belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties would continue developing on good terms in the future, too, sincerely wishing the Congolese Party of Labor bigger success in its work to strengthen the party and achieve the national unity and the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Lao President
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Lao President
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a reply message from Choummaly Sayasone, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party (LPRP) and Lao president, on December 15. 
					 In the message the Lao president expressed, on behalf of the LPRP Central Committee, the government and people of Laos and on his own behalf, deep thanks to Kim Jong Un for sending warmest congratulations and wishes to the LPRP, the government and people of Laos and himself on the occasion of the 40th founding anniversary of the Lao People's Democratic Republic (LPDR). 
					
					 The message expressed the belief that the traditional and excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the LPDR and the DPRK would steadily develop in line with the wishes of the peoples of the two countries, bring substantial interests to the two peoples and make contribution to the regional and global peace and the development of friendly and cooperative relations. 
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and great success in his lofty work.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Nigerian President Muhammadu Buhari on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 105 (2016).
					 It was handed over to an official concerned by the charge d'affaires ad interim of the Nigerian embassy here Wednesday.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received floral baskets from the family of Zhang Wei-hua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, and Ibrahim Mantu, chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, on Wednesday on the occasions of the 4th anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the New Year, Juche 105 (2016).
					 He also received floral baskets from the curator of Kim Jong Suk Library in Peru and Shunichi Narita, Japanese media person, on the New Year.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the missions of the World Food Program and the UN Food and Agriculture Organization here visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Wednesday on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 105 (2016).
					 They laid floral baskets before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Floral Baskets, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Floral Baskets, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received floral baskets and congratulatory letters from diplomatic envoys of different countries here on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the New Year, Juche 105 (2016).
					 Those from the Brazilian and Cambodian ambassadors to the DPRK were handed to officials concerned.
					
					 He also received a congratulatory letter from the Egyptian charge d'affaires ad interim and his embassy here.

articles.title: Industrial Establishments Challenged to Socialist Emulation for Increased Production
articles.content:
Industrial Establishments Challenged to Socialist Emulation for Increased Production
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place at the Cultural House of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex on Wednesday to challenge the industrial establishments across the country to a socialist emulation for increased production for greeting the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with unprecedented labor successes.
					 Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, made a report at the meeting to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers recalled that under the leadership of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, the workers and the trade union members built a new democratic country from scratch, full of conviction of certain victory and optimism, built a socialist industrial state on debris after the war and brought about eye-opening miracles and changes in building a thriving nation despite difficulties and ordeals.
					
					 They called upon all workers and trade union members to turn out in the drive to present the most significant valuable labor gifts to the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea out of patriotism and loyalty, pure conscience and noble sense of obligation.
					
					 They called upon all industrial establishments across the country to launch a dynamic socialist emulation for increased production through collective innovations by helping and leading each other forward in the vigorous drive for grand advance.
					
					 Outlines for the socialist emulation were announced at the meeting.

articles.title: Participants in 3rd Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under KPA Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participants in 3rd Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under KPA Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 3rd Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under the Korean People's Army (KPA) visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They laid bouquets before the graves of Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik, grandparents of the President, and the graves of Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok, parents of the President, and observed a moment's silence.
					
					 After visiting the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum, they went round the old home of the President, recollecting his revolutionary career.
					
					 They visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong where they placed bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and paid tribute to her.
					
					 They visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum.
					
					 They paid tribute to the statue of the President waving back to the columns of the military parade at the square for celebrating the victory in the war.
					
					 They laid bouquets before the sculpture "Victory" in the Monument to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War, paid respects to the victors in the great years and went round various places of the museum.
					
					 They also visited the Phyongchon Revolutionary Site, KPA Museum of Weapons and Equipment, Pyongyang Catfish Farm and the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
 Chongjin, December 30 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen held a meeting at Chongjin Port on Wednesday on the occasion of the fourth anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Present there were the captain and crewmen of the Panama-flagged ship CHANG MING.
					
					 Speakers said that Kim Jong Un demonstrated the dignity and might of the DPRK before the world by successfully carrying forward the Songun idea and cause of the preceding leaders over the past four years.
					
					 He has worked new miracles startling the world in building a thriving socialist nation and highly civilized nation while resolutely shattering the moves of the imperialist aggressor forces to ignite a new war by dint of the tremendous military muscle, they noted.
					
					 They extended support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just cause of national reunification and global peace.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Regarding Cyber Space as Sphere for Domination
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Regarding Cyber Space as Sphere for Domination
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- According to recent foreign press reports including AP, the U.S. decided to increase the number of the existing 32 cyber units to 41 in a bid to bolster up the cyber warfare capability.
					 Minju Joson Wednesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This goes to clearly prove that the U.S. seeks to put the cyber space under its control in a bid to use it for carrying out its scenario to dominate the world.
					
					 By establishing an absolute edge and unchallenged hegemony in the cyber space the U.S. seeks to bar other countries from challenging its strategic interests. 
					
					 It is the U.S. calculation that the unchallenged edge in the cyber space would help establish hegemony worldwide as countries are becoming increasingly dependent on internet.  
					
					 The U.S. is working hard to justify the increase of the number of cyber units, claiming that it is aimed to cope with "cyber attacks" from the DPRK and China. 
					
					 The U.S. is pleased with the "success" made in the cyber attack and poised to escalate the cyber warfare worldwide just as a bloodthirsty wolf is running in quest of fresh prey.
					
					 All facts go to prove that the U.S. is the ferocious enemy of peace and mankind as it unhesitatingly stretches its tentacles of aggression even to the space and internet, wealth common to mankind, in an effort to realize its ambition to dominate the world.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Raps Japan's Moves for Emerging Military Giant
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Raps Japan's Moves for Emerging Military Giant
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Japan recently conducted the second test-fire of SM-3 Block 2A now under joint development with the U.S. projected to be completed by the end of 2016. Japan's munitions monopolies started the development of multi-purpose helicopters with the U.S. and are conducting behind-the-scene project for the joint development of submarines with Australia.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 Development of ultra-modern weaponry worldwide clearly proves that Japan's moves to become a military giant have reached a very dangerous phase since the appearance of the Defense Weaponry Agency.
					
					 Prior to its emergence, the Japanese government lifted the embargo on arms export, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Japan has openly cooperated in arms technology with the U.S. which should be put on the top list of application of the "three principles of arms export."
					
					 It is now justifying the arms export by breaching the principles which had proved useless. Lurking behind this is not just its economic greed to get its share in the global arms market but its ulterior aim to lay a new springboard for the development of its munitions industry and for reinvasion.
					
					 Japan has the largest combat forces next to the U.S. in the capitalist world. Not content with this, it is working hard to increase defense budget to the maximum, lift the embargo on arms export, acquire latest military technology and purchase modern weaponry. This is little short of openly declaring before the world that the defeated country and war criminal state is again rushing headlong into militarization and overseas expansion.

articles.title: Withdrawal of SL Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Withdrawal of SL Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Civic and social organizations and religious organizations of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Dec. 23, demanding the repeal of the "Security Law" (SL) and the dissolution of the Intelligence Service (IS). They included the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, the People's Solidarity for the Repeal of the "National Security Law" and the "Christian Pastors' Group for Peaceful Action."
					 The speakers disclosed the unreasonable moves of the security authorities to fabricate a "spying case" by bringing the baseless charge of "espionage" to pastor Kim Song Yun.
					
					 They urged the security authorities to make an apology to the people for their illegal suppression of the religionist and release him at once.
					
					 The repeal of the evil law and the dissolution of the IS should no longer be delayed, they demanded.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Denounce Authorities' Humiliating Act
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Denounce Authorities' Humiliating Act
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Sibo in a commentary on Dec. 29 denounced the authorities for striking in a humiliating way a deal concerning the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 Denouncing the south Korean regime for coercively striking the negotiations over the issue on Dec. 28, the commentary noted that even at a glance one could see that the draft document is peppered with problems.
					
					 What is most problematic is that the regime signed the document declaring the complete solution to the issue of the sexual slavery in return for a few pennies of reparations. 
					
					 The regime promised it would not take issue with the Japanese government over the sexual slavery issue again and would withdraw the statue of a girl sexual slave outside the Japanese embassy, the commentary deplored, adding it is hard to say whom the south Korean regime speaks for.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Submission to Japan Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Submission to Japan Flailed
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, issued a statement on Dec. 28 to denounce the south Korean conservative authorities for submitting to Japan over the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 The statement recalled that a humiliating agreement on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army was made at the foreign ministers' meeting of south Korea and Japan held in Seoul that day.
					
					 The south Korean authorities claimed the above-said issue has been settled finally by accepting the words "apology" and "reflection" which did not clarify the state and legal responsibility of the chief executive of Japan who embellished the inhuman crimes, the statement charged.
					
					 It denounced the agreement reached at the foreign ministers' meeting due to the south Korean authorities' submission to Japan as a treacherous act of conniving at the criminal moves of the Japanese reactionaries to hide its past crimes and paving the way for its reinvasion.

articles.title: Korean in Japan Denounce S. Korean Authorities' Traitorous Act
articles.content:
Korean in Japan Denounce S. Korean Authorities' Traitorous Act
 Tokyo, December 29 (KNS-KCNA) -- Kang Chu Ryon, vice-chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, issued a statement Wednesday to denounce the south Korean conservative authorities for their traitorous acts.
					 Vehemently denouncing the south Korean authorities for submitting to Japan by joining it in its criminal acts to put under the carpet its past crimes forever, far from calling the Japanese authorities to task over the sexual slavery and demanding them make an apology and reparation, the statement continued:
					
					 It is a well-known fact that the recent south Korea-Japan foreign ministers' meeting took place at the beck and call and under the pressure of the U.S. to maintain its hegemony in Asia and realize invasion of Korea.
					
					 The victims of the sexual slavery are protesting the south Korean regime for accepting Japan's unreasonable demand of withdrawing the statue of a girl sexual slave outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul, and south Korean people are branding the recent "agreement" as the "second humiliating agreement between south Korea and Japan" reached by Park Geun Hye in the wake of that by Park Chung-Hee.
					
					 Park Geun Hye should clearly remember that if she persists in maintaining power only, submitting to outsiders in disregard of the nation's destiny, she would be unanimously denounced by all fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Korean Human Rights Association in Japan Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Servility to Japan
articles.content:
Korean Human Rights Association in Japan Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Servility to Japan
 Tokyo, December 29 (KNS-KCNA) -- The Korean Human Rights Association in Japan Tuesday made public a statement in denunciation of shameful servility of the south Korean authorities challenging the wishes of the nation to settle the past crimes of the Japanese imperialists. 
					 The statement said that the "agreement" between Japan and south Korea over the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army is the unreasonable political bargaining chip as it nullifies Japan's state and legitimate responsibility for the past crimes in disregard of the dignity and human rights of the victims of the sexual slavery. 
					
					 There would never be "final" and "irreversible" settlement of the most brutal inhuman crimes in history without Japan's acknowledgement of legal liability and sincere apology and reparation to the whole Korean people, the statement said, adding:
					
					 We strongly demand the south Korean authorities stop at once challenging the just struggle of all Koreans for the settlement of the past crimes of Japan being servile to Japan.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings took place in Indonesia, India and DR Congo on Dec. 17, the fourth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise.
					 The general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia said that HE Kim Jong Il was a great master of ideology and theory who formulated the Juche idea as Kimilsungism and united the entire party and all people as one under the banner of it and an outstanding statesman who protected the country's dignity and sovereignty with his original Songun politics.
					
					 The chairman of the DR Congo Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il noted that he, a military genius, prepared the People's Army as an invincible one and turned the DPRK into a political and ideological power, military power, nuclear weapons state and satellite manufacturer and launcher with his Songun politics.
					
					 A message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting in DR Congo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreigners
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on the occasion of the fourth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise.
					 There took place a seminar, photo and book exhibition and film show in Pakistan, seminar on Marshal Kim Jong Un's work in Spain and round-table talks and photo exhibition in France between Dec. 12 and 17.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and photos dealing with the exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were books and photos introducing the successes made by the Korean army and people in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Korean film "The Tower of the Juche Idea" was screened at the film show.
					
					 Zabed Ansari, secretary general of the Karachi branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association, said in a report that Kim Jong Il is revered by the world progressives as he performed great feats for accomplishing the cause of human independence.
					
					 The chief of the Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said that HE Kim Jong Il was an outstanding Songun brilliant commander who always led socialist Korea to victory and a peerless patriot who provided the self-defensive nuclear deterrent firmly guaranteeing the final victory of the cause of Songun.
					
					 Benoit Quennedey, international secretary of the Radical Party of Left of France, and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il for performing feats for accomplishing the cause of national reunification and global independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk Praised by Guinean Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk Praised by Guinean Organization
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The Guinean National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism released a bulletin "Brilliant life" on the occasion of the 98th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The bulletin said in an article that she was born in a poor peasant family in Hoeryong, North Hamgyong Province, adding:
					
					 She, who grew up undergoing sorrow as a member of the stateless nation due to the Japanese imperialists' occupation of Korea, embarked upon the road of revolution in her early years.
					
					 She fully displayed extraordinary military wisdom and strategy, matchless pluck and bravery, marksmanship never missing any target, in many battlefields during the hard-fought anti-Japanese war and thus gained fame as the anti-Japanese war hero.
					
					 Though her life was short in liberated Korea, her traces are recorded in Korea.
					
					 The bulletin said in another article that she defended President Kim Il Sung at the risk of her life in every battlefield of the anti-Japanese war.
					
					 Her loyalty to the President remained unchanged even after the country's liberation.
					
					 She is alive in the hearts of the Korean people as the incarnation of devotedly defending the leader.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed by Indian Newspapers
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed by Indian Newspapers
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Indian newspapers carried special write-ups to observe the fourth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 The Dec. 17th issue of Indian and World Event dedicated two whole pages to articles under the headline "Mt. Paektu and Kim Jong Il" illustrated with his photo. 
					
					 An article titled "Ushering in new era of independent reunification" said that he devoted all his energies and efforts to achieving national reunification. 
					
					 Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il, who pursued the outstanding Songun policy to protect the destiny of the country and the nation and open a turning phase for reunification of Korea, is always alive as peerless patriot in humble reverence of the Korean people and other progressives of the world, the article added. 
					
					 The Dec. 12th issue of Awaking in an article titled "Songun brilliant commander" said that Kim Jong Il, leader of Korea, was the distinguished strategist with matchless pluck. It praised him as a brilliant commander recognized by the whole world when a nuclear crisis occurred on the Korean Peninsula in the 1990s. 
					
					 The newspaper said he formulated the Songun politics as the main political mode under socialism and led the socialist cause and the cause of independence against imperialism to victory.

articles.title: Video Conference of Juche Idea Study Bodies Held in UK
articles.content:
Video Conference of Juche Idea Study Bodies Held in UK
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- There took place a video conference of the organizations for friendship with the Korean people and Juche idea study organizations in UK on Dec. 13 to mark the 60th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's work "On Eliminating Dogmatism and Formalism and Establishing Juche in Ideological Work". 
					 Present there were members of the Korean Friendship Association UK, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea. 
					
					 The full text of the work was read out at the conference. 
					
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, praised the revolutionary careers and exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk. 
					
					 The conference discussed the issues of intensifying the activities supporting the just cause of the Korean people and expanding the organizations for the study of the Juche idea, Songun idea and reenergizing their activities.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto Kim Yang Gon
articles.content:
Falleció Kim Yang Gon
Pyongyang, 30 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Kim Yang Gon, miembro del Buró Político y secretario del Comité Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y diputado a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la República Popular Democrática de Corea, falleció a las 6:15 del día 29 de diciembre del 104 (2015) de la Era Juche a 73 años de edad por el accidente de tránsito.
					 Kim Yang Gon era soldado revolucionario fiel al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el más íntimo compañero de armas y consecuente compañero revolucionario del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					  Igualmente era hijo excelente del PTC y el pueblo quien  luchó abnegadamente dedicando todo lo suyo a lograr la  victoria final de la causa de la revolución Juche en pleno acato de la dirección del Partido y el líder.
					
					  Nacido en una familia de bracero muy pobre en el período de la dominación colonial del imperialismo japonés, gozó de una nueva vida en el regazo del Presidente después de la liberación del país (15 de agosto) y creció como verdadero revolucionario y competente activista político bajo la confianza y amor particular del Presidente y el Dirigente.
					
					  Después de graduado de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, contribuyó mucho a preparar firmemente a los jóvenes como sucesores confiables de la causa de la revolución Juche, asegurar el alto prestigio internacional del PTC y fortalecer la solidaridad con los partidos políticos progresistas del mundo fungiendo como instructor en el CC de la Unión de la Juventud Trabajadora Socialista de Corea y el Comité de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero y como instructor, subjefe y jefe de sección, subjefe y jefe de departamento en el Departamento Internacional del CC del PTC.
					
					  Además, al cargar con la importante responsabilidad como secretario y jefe del Departamento del Frente Unido, del CC del PTC, se abnegó por materializar la política del PTC en materia de la reunificación independiente de la patria.
					
					  Apoyando fielmente la única dirección del CC del PTC en el importante período histórico para el cumplimiento de la causa de la revolución de Juche, dedicó toda su sabiduría y entusiasmo al esfuerzo por fortalecer y desarrollar el PTC como agrupación política de los grandes Líderes y materializar cabalmente sus legados en materia de la reunificación de la patria.
					
					  Armado firmemente con la gran idea Juche, la del Songun, él fue infinitamente fiel a la causa del Partido hasta el último momento de su vida.
					
					  El día 29, fue publicada la esquela mortuaria en nombre común del CC del PTC y el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC.
					
					  La nota subraya que aunque falleció Kim, quedarán para siempre sus esfuerzos abnegados y proezas brillantes dedicados por el Partido y la revolución y por la causa de la construcción de un Estado próspero y la causa de la reunificación de la patria.
					
					  El mismo día, el CC del PTC y el Presidium de la APS de la RPDC publicaron que se realizarán los funerales del difunto Kim Yang Gon como los de carácter nacional y compusieron el Comité Funerario Estatal, cuyo presidente es el Mariscal Kim Jong Un y cuyos miembros son 69 inclusive Kim Yong Nam.
					
					El Comité funerario avisó que el ataúd del difunto está colocado en la Casa de Sojang del municipio de Pothonggang en esta capital, recibirá a los asistentes al funeral desde las 14:00 hasta las 19:00 del día 30 y sacará a las 8:00 del día 31 el ataúd de casa para el entierro.

Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunta Ri Yong Ok
Pyongyang, 30 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 29 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro de la difunta Ri Yong Ok, ex combatiente revolucionaria antijaponesa, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena maniobras de Japón por militarización de país
Pyongyang, 30 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Hace unos días, se efectuó en Japón la segunda prueba de lanzamiento del misil interceptor "SM-3 Block 2A" para el emplazamiento marítimo que este país isleño está desarrollando junto con Estados Unidos hasta finales de 2016.
					　También, los consorcios bélicos japoneses empezaron el desarrollo del helicóptero de multiuso junto con EE.UU. y están desplegando los trabajos secretos para el desarrollo conjunto de submarino con Australia.
					
					　Tales movimientos por el desarrollo de las armas sofisticadas que Japón desarrolla en la palestra internacional demuestran que se aceleran en la etapa muy peligrosa las maniobras de este país isleño por la militarización del país después de la organización de la Agencia de Equipos de Defensa.
					
					　Así señala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del día 30 y continúa:
					
					　El gobierno japonés levantó las medidas de prohibición de  exportación de armas antes de la creación de dicha agencia.
					
					　Este país isleño ha venido efectuando oficialmente la cooperación técnica de armas con EE.UU., primer objeto de los países a ser aplicados "Tres Principios de la Exportación de Armas".
					
					　Ahora, racionaliza la exportación de armas despreciando estos principios. Esto no parte simplemente de la codicia económica de ganar el dinero en el mercado mundial de armas. 
					
					　Su objeto principal reside en preparar el nuevo trampolín para el desarrollo de la industria bélica y la nueva agresión.
					
					　Japón, segundo país poseedor de enormes fuerzas armadas en el mundo capitalista después de EE.UU., incrementa al máximo el presupuesto de defensa nacional, canceló las medidas de prohibición de la exportación de armas y hace desesperados esfuerzos por obtener las técnicas militares sofisticadas y los armamentos ultramodernos. 
					
					　Esto muestra que este país derrotado y criminal de guerra declaró oficialmente al mundo su decisión de volver a tomar el camino de la conversión en la potencia militar y de la expansión a ultramar.
